::: services-intro
We deliver comprehensive data science solutions built on transferable technical capabilities. Our expertise in R programming, statistical analysis, and software engineering enables us to solve complex analytical challenges across diverse industries and domains.
:::

## Core Services {#core-services}

### Advanced Analytics & Statistical Consulting {#analytics}

::: service-detail
::: service-header-img
![](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551288049-bebda4e38f71?w=800&h=300&fit=crop&q=80){.service-banner}
:::

Transform complex data into actionable insights using rigorous statistical methods, predictive modeling, and advanced analytical techniques.

#### Core Capabilities:

**Exploratory Data Analysis**
- Comprehensive data profiling and pattern detection
- Multivariate analysis and dimensionality reduction
- Outlier detection and anomaly identification
- Data visualization and insight communication

**Statistical Modeling & Inference**
- Regression analysis (linear, logistic, GLM, mixed effects)
- Time series analysis and forecasting
- Survival analysis and event history modeling
- Bayesian inference and hierarchical modeling

**Predictive Analytics & Machine Learning**
- Classification and regression models
- Ensemble methods and model stacking
- Feature engineering and selection
- Model validation and performance evaluation
- Uncertainty quantification

**Experimental Design & Causal Inference**
- A/B testing and experimental design
- Power analysis and sample size determination
- Propensity score matching
- Difference-in-differences analysis
- Instrumental variables and causal DAGs

**Spatial & Geospatial Analysis**
- Spatial statistics and geostatistics
- Point pattern analysis
- Spatial interpolation and kriging
- Geographic information systems integration

#### Example Applications:

**Environmental:** Impact prediction modeling, baseline environmental data analysis, biodiversity metrics, regulatory compliance analytics (ESIA/EIA frameworks)

**Healthcare:** Clinical trial analysis, epidemiological modeling, patient outcome prediction, health services research

**Business:** Customer churn prediction, demand forecasting, pricing optimization, market segmentation

**Finance:** Risk modeling, credit scoring, portfolio optimization, fraud detection

**Research:** Survey analysis, meta-analysis, publication-quality statistical reporting

#### Why This Matters:

Rigorous statistical analysis ensures your decisions are based on evidence, not assumptions. Our methodologically sound approach produces defensible, reproducible results that stand up to scrutiny.

#### Typical Deliverables:
- Comprehensive statistical reports with clear interpretation
- Reproducible R analysis scripts and documentation
- Publication-ready visualizations and tables
- Model validation and diagnostic reports
- Technical documentation and methodology descriptions

**Tools & Technologies:** R, tidyverse, tidymodels, caret, Stan, brms, mgcv, sf, spatial packages

[Schedule a Consultation ‚Üí](contact.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Data Management & Integration

::: service-detail
::: service-header-img
![](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558494949-ef010cbdcc31?w=800&h=300&fit=crop&q=80){.service-banner}
:::

Design and implement robust data pipelines, quality assurance frameworks, and integration systems that ensure data reliability, accessibility, and scalability.

#### Core Capabilities:

**Data Pipeline Development**
- ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) process design
- Automated data ingestion from multiple sources
- Real-time and batch processing workflows
- Scalable data processing architectures

**Data Quality & Validation**
- Comprehensive data validation frameworks
- Automated quality checks and anomaly detection
- Data cleansing and standardization
- Metadata management and documentation

**Database Design & Optimization**
- Relational and NoSQL database design
- Query optimization and performance tuning
- Data warehousing and dimensional modeling
- Version control and change tracking

**API Development & Integration**
- RESTful API design and implementation
- Third-party API integration
- Authentication and security protocols
- Rate limiting and error handling

**Reporting & Dashboard Automation**
- Automated report generation systems
- Scheduled data refreshes and distribution
- Multi-format output (PDF, Excel, HTML, interactive)
- Email notifications and alerting

#### Example Applications:

**Environmental:** Multi-source environmental monitoring integration, ESIA data repositories, sustainability KPI tracking, ESG reporting systems, biodiversity databases

**Healthcare:** Electronic health records integration, clinical data warehouses, patient monitoring systems, regulatory reporting

**Business:** Customer data platforms, sales and marketing analytics, inventory management, financial reporting automation

**Research:** Multi-study data integration, longitudinal research databases, publication data management, open data repositories

**Public Sector:** Open data portals, performance monitoring systems, citizen feedback platforms, transparency dashboards

#### Why This Matters:

Poor data management leads to inconsistent reporting, compliance issues, and missed insights. Well-designed data systems become strategic assets that enable agile decision-making.

#### Typical Deliverables:
- Production-ready data pipelines with monitoring
- Comprehensive data quality reports and dashboards
- Database schema and technical documentation
- API documentation and integration guides
- Automated reporting systems with scheduling

**Tools & Technologies:** R, databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite), Plumber, httr, DBI, dbplyr, pins

### Enterprise R Application Development {#r-development}

::: service-detail
::: service-header-img
![](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555949963-aa79dcee981c?w=800&h=300&fit=crop&q=80){.service-banner}
:::

Build production-grade analytical applications and interactive dashboards using modern R frameworks and professional software engineering practices.

#### Core Capabilities:

**Interactive Shiny Applications**
- Modular architecture using Rhino framework
- Clean separation of concerns (UI, server, business logic)
- Responsive design with bslib and Bootstrap
- Performance optimization for large datasets
- Real-time data updates and reactivity

**Data Visualization & Dashboards**
- Interactive plots with plotly and highcharter
- Geographic visualizations with leaflet
- Custom ggplot2 themes and extensions
- Executive dashboards and KPI tracking
- Multi-page applications with navigation

**Software Engineering Best Practices**
- Comprehensive unit and integration testing (testthat, shinytest2)
- Code review and quality standards
- Version control with git
- Continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD)
- Documentation with roxygen2 and pkgdown

**Security & Authentication**
- User authentication (OAuth, LDAP, database)
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Session management and security headers
- Data encryption in transit and at rest
- Audit logging and compliance

**Deployment & DevOps**
- Cloud deployment (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
- Posit Connect and Shiny Server
- Containerization with Docker
- Load balancing and scaling strategies
- Monitoring, logging, and error tracking

#### Example Applications:

**Environmental:** Real-time environmental monitoring dashboards, ESIA data exploration platforms, sustainability reporting systems, compliance tracking tools

**Healthcare:** Clinical trial dashboards, patient outcome trackers, hospital performance monitoring, epidemiological visualization tools

**Business:** Sales analytics dashboards, customer segmentation tools, inventory management systems, financial reporting platforms

**Research:** Interactive data explorers for publications, research collaboration platforms, grant portfolio tracking, lab management systems

**Public Sector:** Citizen feedback portals, budget transparency dashboards, performance monitoring systems, open data exploration tools

#### Why Choose R for Applications:

R excels at statistical computing and data visualization, making it ideal for analytical applications. Combined with modern frameworks like Rhino, you get enterprise-grade applications with the analytical power R is known for.

#### Typical Deliverables:
- Production-ready Shiny applications
- Comprehensive test suites and documentation
- Deployment configurations and guides
- User manuals and training materials
- Source code with version control

**Tools & Technologies:** rhino, shiny, bslib, plotly, leaflet, DT, testthat, shinytest2, Docker, git

[See What's Possible ‚Üí](contact.qmd){.btn .btn-primary}
:::

## Frequently Asked Questions

::: faq-section
**Do you work with clients outside Kenya?**

Yes! While we're based in Kenya with deep expertise in Kenyan environmental regulations, we work with clients globally. Our R programming and analytical expertise is applicable anywhere.

**What size organizations do you work with?**

We work with organizations of all sizes‚Äîfrom individual consultants and NGOs to government agencies and large corporations. Our boutique approach means we provide senior-level attention regardless of project size.

**Can you help with urgent/short-deadline projects?**

We'll always be honest about what's feasible. Contact us to discuss your timeline and we'll let you know if we can help or suggest alternatives.

**Do you provide ongoing support after project completion?**

Yes! We offer maintenance retainers and can provide ongoing support as needed. We want your solutions to remain valuable long-term.

**How do you ensure data confidentiality?**

We treat all client data with strict confidentiality, use secure communication channels, can sign NDAs, and follow data protection best practices.
:::
